page.title: 09A day in my life
page.content: I get up at 7. I go downstairs and have my breakfast. Sometimes I have egg omlette and sometimes I have it with beans. After my breakfast I go upstairs and get dressed. At 8.45 I go to school. At school we get our activity book out and do some work. Today we wrote about going shopping. We wrote about things we like doing and things we don't like doing. At 12 we have our dinner and at 12.30 we go out to play. At one we come in. In the afternoon we play rounders. At 2.30 we have playtime. At 2.45 we come in and have a story. At 3.15 we go home. I play out and at 7.30 I have my tea and then go to bed.
